en.title: Congratulations! FE Awarded Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand 2008!
en.content:
At a Gala Dinner attended by participants from 15 countries held at Genting International Convention Centre, First World Hotel, Genting Highlands, on 05th March 2009, FusionExcel International was awarded the winner of the 4th Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand 2008, for the category of Product Excellence. Receiving the award were FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee.

FE's Quantum Science is recognized as a brand leader that has produced high quality, stylish products and services on a regional level based on the criteria of QUALITY, VALUE, TRUSTWORTHINESS, CREDIBLE IMAGE, CUSTOMER SATISFACTION and BRAND MANAGEMENT.

The Product Excellence Award is presented to reputable brand corporations with a good product track record and high performance value in the market place.

Photo shows FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee proudly receiving the award from Malaysian Deputy Minister of International Trade & Industry YB Datuk Liew Vui Keong and Chairman of Asia Pacific Super Excellent Brand Professor Dr. Denver Tan. Well done! FE is on its way to building a GLOBAL SUPERBRAND!
